Name: Troll
Card Description: When this monster invades a province, destroy all enemy warriors in it.

Name: Dwarf Chieftain
Card Description: *Costs no rage to upgrade or invade

Name: Mountain Giant
Card Description: This monster is a leader.

Name: Fenrir
Card Description: Ragnarok destroys Fenrir's province instead of the doomed one (unless it's Yggdrasil).

Name: Lord of Hammers
Card Description: If you successfully pillage with your leader, you may move him to an adjacent province.

Name: Brothers In Arms
Card Description: *Each pair of your warriors in a province is 3 total STR.

Name: Loki's Dragons
Card Description: Gain 4 glory when a ship of yours is destroyed.

Name: Loki's Domain
Card Description: Gain 1 glory for each figure you release from Valhalla.

Name: Frigga's Charm
Card Description: Upgrade cards cost you 1 less rage to play

Name: Thor's Glory
Card Description: Gain 2 glory whenever at least 2 enemy figures are destroyed in a battle you participate in.

Name: Alfheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Alfheim (gray) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Jotunheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Jotunheim (blue) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Manheim Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Manheim (yellow) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Glorious Death
Card Description: Have at least 4 figures in Valhalla (before Ragnarok). If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Odin's Smite
Card Description: Destroy one warrior from each opponent in this province before comparing STR.

Name: Heimdall's Sight
Card Description: This card has the same value as the highest revealed enemy card.

Name: Frigga's Grace
Card Description: If you pillage successfully, raise another of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Loki's Trickery
Card Description: If you lose, steal 1 rage from the winnign player.

Name: Thor's Hammer
Card Description: Gain 3 glory if you win this battle.

Name: Sea Serpent
Card Description: This monster counts as a ship.

Name: Frigga's Succor
Card Description: When you invade with any figure, you may invade with an additional warrior in that province for free.

Name: Tyr's Domain
Card Description: After you reveal a quest card in combat, you may treat it as a +3 battle card.

Name: Yggdrasil Quest
Card Description: Have the most STR in Yggdrasil. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Name: Odin's Smite
Card Description: Destroy one warrior from each opponent in this province before comparing STR.

Name: Loki's Blessing
Card Description: If you lose a battle, you may invade that province with a warrior for free.

Card Description: Have the most STR in at least one Alfheim (gray) province. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.

Card Description: Gain 4 glory when a ship of yours is destroyed.

Name: Widespread
Card Description: Have the most STR in at least 2 different provinces. If completed, raise one of your clan stats by 1.
